Garden Growing

Want to grow in your garden? Want to grow but don't have a garden? This is the place for you

Want to grow in your garden?
Want to grow but don’t have a garden?
This is the place for you
This spring we are mapping all unused front and back garden space in Tufnell Park to plant up with herbs, tomatoes, flowers or anything else you might like!

If you have some space in your garden which could be put to use, please let us know and we’ll try to match you up with someone who can help make it grow, free of charge, and you’ll even get something to eat out of it!

If you have even a small corner in your front garden, or a window sill, we could stick a pot of herbs in, Contact transition.tufnell.park@googlemail.com

Plus you can put your garden on the LANDSHARE map if you live in the area or not, to find, helpers or help wanted – check http://www.landshare.net/
